data.title: Top 20 Ohio-Based Electronics Manufacturing Companies
data.meta_description: Explore Ohio's vibrant electronics manufacturing industry with the top 20 companies such as Libra Industries and Mega Techway. These companies offer everything from precision machining to interconnect technologies.
data.text:
The electronics manufacturing industry in Ohio is a vibrant sector encompassing a vast array of companies that manufacture everything from cable assemblies to electro-mechanical systems. This industry, rooted in precision and innovation, plays a crucial role in several fields, including security, communication, industry, and health. The Ohio-based electronics manufacturing companies are known for their exceptional quality and commitment to customer satisfaction, enabling them to carve a unique space in both national and global markets. With a future oriented towards technology advancement, industry growth promises to accelerate even further, aided by emerging trends in automation and digitization.

Top 20 electronics manufacturing companies in Ohio

1. Libra Industries

Website: libraindustries.com

Headquarters: Mentor, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1956

Headcount: 201-500

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Libra Industries is a manufacturing company with over 85 years of experience in precision machining, design/assembly of electro-mechanical systems, and PCBA manufacturing. They offer a unique capability of providing complete manufacturing solutions with exceptional customer service.

2. Mega Techway, Inc.

Website: megatechway.com

Headquarters: Mayfield Village, Ohio, United States

Founded: 2004

Headcount: 501-1000

LinkedIn

Mega Techway is a manufacturer of electronic cable assemblies, offering a broad range of interconnect technologies. They specialize in producing cable assembly types and technologies in both high and low volumes.

3. Delta Systems, Inc.

Website: deltasystemsinc.com

Headquarters: Streetsboro, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1972

Headcount: 201-500

Latest funding type: Series Unknown

LinkedIn

Delta Systems is a US-based company that manufactures and designs switches, controllers, and displays for equipment. They specialize in providing innovative solutions for the Outdoor Power Equipment and adjacent industries. Their products are known for their safety, durability, and reliability in harsh environments.

4. IEC Corp

Website: 4iec.com

Headquarters: Medina, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1995

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

IEC Corp is a manufacturing company with facilities in the USA, China, and Mexico (coming in 2020). They specialize in the production of electronic controller boards, PCBs, wire harnesses, sheet metal assemblies, LCD displays, and related accessories. With a focus on technical excellence and flexible manufacturing, they deliver designs quickly, from simple wire harnesses to complex over-molded connectors.

5. Dynalab, Inc.

Website: dynalabems.com

Headquarters: Reynoldsburg, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1981

Headcount: 201-500

LinkedIn

Dynalab EMS is a company that specializes in electronics manufacturing services. They offer dedicated production lines and services compliant with ISO-13485 and ISO-9001:2015 standards. With a focus on quality and efficiency, they provide manufacturing solutions for a variety of industries.

6. Hana Technologies

Website: hanaoh.com

Headquarters: Twinsburg, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1999

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

HANA Technologies is a reputable supplier of electronics manufacturing and assemblies. They offer quality manufacturing services and exceptional support, ensuring a smooth and pain-free production process.

7. InSource Technologies, Inc.

Website: insource-tech.com

Headquarters: Paulding, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1997

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

InSource Technologies is a company that specializes in Wire Harness, Electronic Controls, and Refrigeration Systems. They offer value and streamlining of the supply chain through their capabilities in product design and full production. They focus on Quick Response Manufacturing to improve lead times and prioritize customer needs.

8. Qualtech Technologies Inc.

Website: qualtechinc.com

Headquarters: Willoughby, Ohio, United States

Founded: 2007

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

QualTech is a circuit board assembly company that specializes in custom PCB design and production. With a simple, transparent 5-step process, they ensure customers receive their desired circuit boards on time and on budget.

9. Tj Automation

Website: tjautomationinc.com

Headquarters: Stryker, Ohio, United States

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

TJ Automation Inc. specializes in the design and manufacturing of robotics and automation systems. They offer a wide range of equipment and solutions for tube bending, pick and place units, part assembly, and custom consultation and engineering. With expertise in specialty tooling and vision systems integration, they provide efficient and fully automated solutions for various industries.

10. The Hall Company

Website: hallco.com

Headquarters: Urbana, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1961

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

The Hall Company is a global leader in sensor, printed electronics, and identification product markets. With over 3,000 customers in 16 countries across 4 continents, the company offers world-class solutions to industries such as medical, aviation, appliances, and industrial equipment.

11. Avcom SMT Inc.

Website: avcomsmt.com

Headquarters: Westerville, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1970

Headcount: 1-10

LinkedIn

Avcom is an ITAR-compliant electronic contract manufacturing company founded in 1970. They specialize in quick turn and prototype jobs with the flexibility to choose the services the client requires. They provide services such as Engineering & Design, Manufacturing & Assembly, and Commitment to Quality.

12. Helix Linear Technologies

Website: helixlinear.com

Headquarters: Beachwood, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1969

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Helix Linear is a global leader in the design, engineering, and manufacturing of precision linear motion systems. They specialize in lead screws, acme screws, trapezoidal screws, and linear actuators, offering a wide range of products and solutions. With nearly 50 years of experience, they have helped engineer the success of their customers in various markets.

13. Techtron Systems, Inc.

Website: techtronsys.com

Headquarters: Solon, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1971

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Techtron Systems is a leading technology company that specializes in providing innovative IoT solutions. With over 90 years of combined engineering experience, our team excels in delivering world-class products throughout the entire product life cycle. We offer cost-effective and sensible IoT frameworks to make Smart Device offerings available to all. Partner with us to web-enable your product line and provide your customers with cutting-edge innovation.

14. Maverick Electronics

Website: maverickelectronics.com

Headquarters: Bay Village, Ohio, United States

Headcount: 201-500

Maverickis a premiere custom manufacturer for cable assemblies, harnesses and custom molded cable products, with an emphasis on value added service and support. Mavericks success has been based on supplying a cost-effective combination of product quality, engineering support, manufacturing responsiveness and business flexibility.

15. Ada Technologies

Website: adatechinc.com

Headquarters: Ada, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1995

Headcount: 201-500

Ada Technologies manufactures precise change control systems for the automobile industry. Transmission shift levers, CVT Flange assemblies, control shaft assemblies, parking brake pawls, and change lever assemblies are all manufactured by them. They also provide machined components by envisioning and organizing mass manufacturing lines that are tailored to the needs and specifications of their customers.

16. Silfex, Inc. - A Division of Lam Research Corporation

Website: silfex.com

Headquarters: Eaton, Ohio, United States

Founded: 2006

Headcount: 1001-5000

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Silfex is a leading provider of precision silicon components used in semiconductor manufacturing equipment. They play a unique role in the global electronics industry by connecting the world. Their products enable the creation of innovative technology used in smartphones, solar panels, and other everyday devices.

17. GEON Performance Solutions

Website: geon.com

Headquarters: Westlake, Ohio, United States

Headcount: 1001-5000

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

GEON is a performance solutions company providing high-performance materials and custom polymers. They offer a wide range of products including polyvinyl chloride (PVC), chlorinated polyvinyl chloride (CPVC), and polyolefins. Their services include manufacturing and polymer compounding, catering to industries such as wire & cable, building & construction, automotive, healthcare, and electrical & electronics.

18. Telesis Technologies, Inc.

Website: telesis.com

Headquarters: Circleville, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1971

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Telesis Technologies, Inc. specializes in state-of-the-art laser marking technologies for permanent part marking applications. They offer a comprehensive inventory of high-quality laser marking machines for various industries. Telesis' BenchMarkÂ® Laser Markers and TelescribeÂ® Marking Systems improve consistency and increase throughput. They also provide industry guidance resources and a monthly newsletter. The company differentiates itself with powerful, quiet motors and custom engineered solutions. Telesis supports industries such as aluminum, copper, titanium, wood, glass, and stainless steel.

19. NeoGraf Solutions, LLC

Website: neograf.com

Headquarters: Lakewood, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1881

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

NeoGraf is a leading company in the graphite industry, known for its innovative products. Trusted by global corporations, NeoGraf provides cutting-edge technology solutions. Their offerings include GrafGuard, a fire retardant additive for building materials and automotive applications. NeoGraf also specializes in thermal management solutions, offering HiTherm thermal interface materials for demanding applications. With over a century of expertise, NeoGraf's graphite materials are the key ingredient for a sustainable future.

20. JBC Technologies, Inc.

Website: jbc-tech.com

Headquarters: North Ridgeville, Ohio, United States

Founded: 1988

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

JBC Technologies is a US-based ISO 9001:2015 certified large-volume precision die-cutter and flexible materials converter. They offer custom solutions for customers worldwide using specialized converting equipment and value-added services. Their expertise lies in performance materials, offering applications in insulation, bonding, sealing, and more.

Want to find more electronics manufacturing companies?

If you want to find more companies that offer solutions ranging from precision machining to cable assembly you can do so with Inven. This list was built with Inven and there are hundreds of companies like these globally.

With Inven you'll also get to know the company's:

Ownership: Which of these are private equity backed? Which are family-owned?

Contact data: Who are the owners and CEO's? What are their emails and phone numbers?

Financials: How do these companies perform financially? What are their revenues and profit margins?

...and a lot more!
